entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is mentioned as the one who reinstated Umbridge's old decree forbidding gatherings of three or more students or any unofficial student societies. He is also described as facing a constant, low level of mutiny from a hard core of students.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is mentioned as being banned from going into Hogsmeade and is suspected to be leading Dumbledore's Army. Harry wants to see her badly.

entities.name: umbridge
entities.description: Umbridge's old decree is reinstated by Snape, indicating that Umbridge was previously in charge.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore's Army is mentioned as being continued by Ginny and possibly Neville and Luna. Harry thinks of Dumbledore and misses him.

entities.name: neville
entities.description: Neville is suspected to be part of Dumbledore's Army along with Ginny and Luna.

entities.name: luna
entities.description: Luna is suspected to be part of Dumbledore's Army along with Ginny and Neville.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character who deduces that Ginny and possibly Neville and Luna are continuing Dumbledore's Army.

entities.name: phineas nigellus
entities.description: Phineas Nigellus is mentioned as talking about Snape's crackdown.

entities.name: godric's hollow
entities.description: Godric's Hollow is mentioned as a place where Harry imagines going back to join the destabilization of Snape's regime.

entities.name: hogsmeade
entities.description: Ginny is banned from going into Hogsmeade.

entities.name: hogwarts
entities.description: Harry misses Hogwarts nearly as much as his ex-girlfriend.

relationships.description: Snape reinstated Umbridge's old decree forbidding gatherings of three or more students or any unofficial student societies.
Ginny is suspected to be leading Dumbledore's Army.
Harry wants to see Ginny badly.
Harry misses Dumbledore nearly as much as his ex-girlfriend.
Harry misses Hogwarts nearly as much as his ex-girlfriend.
